resources.string:
The goal of Prospect is to own more mines than your opponent at the end of the game.


Players will take turns choosing a capture mode from Dot mode, Line mode, and Rectangle mode, before making a selection on the game board. Be sure to use two fingers when using a Line mode or Rectangle mode capture! Each capture mode can capture more mines than the last, but the chance of a successful capture goes down as well, with a Dot capture being guaranteed, a Line capture having a 75\% success rate, and a Rectangle capture having a 10-50\% capture rate depending on the size of the rectangle.


Once each player has performed a capture, the next round will begin. The length of the game is decided before play, and can be chosen in 5 round increments from 5 to 50. Once the players complete the final round, the winner is decided as the player with the most mines owned.
